response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between the product's value and your budget, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
